dish_name: Fruit Pizza Drizzled With Fruit Glaze
description: This Fruit Pizza drizzled with a luscious glaze captures the essence of summer, transforming a simple dessert into a celebration with fresh fruits.
ingredients: [{"name": "sugar cookie dough", "units": "large", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cream cheese", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "strawberries", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "kiwi", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "blueberries", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "raspberries", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "blackberries", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "fruit glaze", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}]
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). 2. Roll out the cookie dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. 3. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown and cool completely. 4. Mix cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla until smooth. 5. Spread the cream cheese mixture over the cooled cookie crust. 6. Arrange sliced fruits on top. 7. Drizzle with fruit glaze. 8. Chill for at least 30 minutes. 9. Slice and serve.
notes: Consider adding citrus zest or using a variety of fruits for enhanced flavor.
